price: Tòhun ti bí wọ́n ṣe ní ìfẹ́ sí (ọrọ̀ tó), wọ́n ń fún mẹ̀kúnnù, ọmọ òrukàn àti ẹrú ní oúnjẹ jẹ.
arabic: وَيُطۡعِمُونَ ٱلطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِۦ مِسۡكِينٗا وَيَتِيمٗا وَأَسِيرًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wayuṭ'ʿimūna al-ṭaʿāma ʿalā ḥubbihi mis'kīnan wayatīman wa-asīran
